title: Service disruption on North East Line due to maintenance work

updates.text: Due to maintenance works, train svcs on the NEL between NE1 HarbourFront & NE6 Dhoby Ghaut will be affected by early closure at ard 11pm tonight & tomorrow night - Mar 29 & 30. Shuttle Bus 22 will be in operation to serve the affected stns while Svcs 315 & 325 will run until 1am.

Due to maintenance works, train svcs on the NEL between NE1 HarbourFront & NE6 Dhoby Ghaut will be affected by early closure at ard 11pm this Fri & Sat - Mar 29 & 30. Pls note: Shuttle Bus 22 will be in operation to serve the affected stns while Svcs 315 & 325 will run until 1am.
